name: vocabdict
description: VocabDict is a Safari Web Extension designed to help English learners improve their vocabulary through dictionary lookup, vocabulary management, and spaced repetition learning.

scripts.test:swift: xcodebuild test -scheme 'vocabDict (macOS)' -destination 'platform=macOS' CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY='' CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO | grep -E '(Test Suite|passed|failed|Executed)' || true
scripts.test:all: npm run test:js && npm run test:swift
scripts.build:ios: npm run build && xcodebuild -scheme 'vocabDict (iOS)' -configuration Release clean build
scripts.build:macos: npm run build && xcodebuild -scheme 'vocabDict (macOS)' -configuration Release clean build
scripts.build:all: npm run build && xcodebuild -scheme 'vocabDict (iOS)' -configuration Release clean build && xcodebuild -scheme 'vocabDict (macOS)' -configuration Release clean build

author: Ryota Miyoshi
